articles.title: Banquet Given by DPRK Government
articles.content:
Banquet Given by DPRK Government
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government hosted a banquet at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday to celebrate the 61st birthday of the DPRK.
					 Present there were senior party, army and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly, leading officials of party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, former unconverted long-term prisoners who are pro-reunification patriots, officials in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media, heroes and heroines, persons of merit, congratulatory groups, delegations and visiting groups of overseas Koreans, compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys of foreign countries and representatives of international organizations here, delegations of different countries and foreign guests now staying in the DPRK.
					
					Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, said in his speech at the banquet that over the last more than six decades the DPRK has recorded a history of glorious struggles and victories and a history of gigantic creations and changes; it has defended the independence and sovereignty of the country and built rich and powerful and prosperous Korean-style socialism, weathering the grim tempest of the revolution under the leadership of President
						 Kim Il Sung and the great party.
					
					 Recalling that Kim Il Sung built the best independent socialist state centered on the popular masses on this land and wisely led it, regarding believing in people as in Heaven as the basic idea of nation-building and independence as the life and soul of the country and the nation, and thus laid powerful political, military and economic foundations for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, the speaker noted that this constitutes a precious and immortal exploit performed by the President for the growth and development of the DPRK and the bright future of the country and the nation.  
					
					Kim Yong Nam said that under the ever-victorious Songun guidance of
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il the DPRK has ushered in a great heyday of prosperity, exalting the dignity and might of Kim Il Sung's Korea generation after generation.
					
					The DPRK will more strikingly demonstrate to the whole world its dignity and might as glorious
						 Kim Il Sung's Korea, a thriving socialist power shining with Juche and Songun thanks to the outstanding Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il, the single-minded unity of all the servicepersons and people rallied close around the headquarters of the revolution and their inexhaustible mental power and the firm military guarantee provided by the invincible revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Felicitations to Kim Jong Il from Russian President
articles.content:
Felicitations to Kim Jong Il from Russian President
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a message of greetings from D. Medvedev, president of the Russian Federation, on Wednesday on the occasion of the birthday of the DPRK.
					 The Russian President in his message expressed expectation that the mutual cooperation between Russia and the DPRK would continue to develop in the interests of the two peoples and thus contribute to strengthening peace and stability in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia.
					
					 The message wished Kim Jong Il success and happiness and the Korean people prosperity.

articles.title: Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials, commanding officers of the Korean People's Army, the chairperson of a friendly party and leading officials of the party and armed forces bodies and working people's organizations visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace on Wednesday on the occasion of the birthday of the DPRK, and paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung.
					 Laid before the statue of the President was a floral basket in the joint name of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, the WPK Central Military Commission, the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 The participants paid high tribute to the statue of Kim Il Sung, the father of socialist Korea and the founder and builder of the DPRK, and made a bow to him in humble reverence.
					
					 That day, anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters, servicepersons of the KPA and people from all walks of life visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace. 
					
					 On the same day the diplomatic corps, the military attaches corps and representatives of international organizations here, the director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, the delegation of Kyodo News of Japan and the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan and other foreign guests and overseas compatriots visited the palace and paid homage to the President.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were placed before the statues of President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the 61st birthday of the DPRK.
					 Servicepersons of the People's Army, people from all walks of life and school youth and children visited the statue of the President on Mansu Hill.
					
					 Seen standing before the statue of the President was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Laid before the statue of the President were floral baskets in the name of the party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, KPA units, scientific, educational, cultural and art, public health and media institutions, industrial establishments, schools, etc. and bouquets and flowers.
					
					 Also placed there was a floral basket in the name of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front. 
					
					 The participants paid tribute to the President in deep reverence. 
					
					 Servicepersons, people and school youth and children across the country laid floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before the statues of the President in their residential areas.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid at Martyrs Cemeteries, Monuments, Statues and Graves
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid at Martyrs Cemeteries, Monuments, Statues and Graves
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery on Wednesday on the occasion of the birthday of the DPRK.
					 Seen standing on the wreath-laying stands of the cemeteries were wreaths sent by Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Among the participants were senior party, army and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the KPA and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 Wreaths were laid before the cemeteries in the name of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, the DPRK Cabinet, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, working people's organizations, ministries, national institutions, KPA units, educational, public health and media institutions, party and power organs and industrial establishments and farms in the city. 
					
					 The participants paid high tribute to the martyrs.
					
					 Meanwhile, wreaths, bouquets and flowers were laid before the statues of martyrs, the monuments to fallen fighters of the KPA and the graves of martyrs in various parts of the country on the same day.

articles.title: Art Performances Given to Celebrate Birthday of DPRK
articles.content:
Art Performances Given to Celebrate Birthday of DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The Samjiyon Band of the Mansudae Art Troupe gave its performance at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday to mark the 61st birthday of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea
					 Among the audience were senior party, army and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, working people in the city, congratulatory groups, delegations and visiting groups of overseas compatriots and compatriots, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, diplomatic envoys of various countries and  representatives of international organizations here and foreign guests.
					
					 Put on the stage were instrumental music and song "Greeting the Sun Rising over the Taedong River", an immortal classic masterpiece, music "Song of Mangyongdae", mixed quintet "My Country of Songun" and other colorful numbers.
					
					The performers sang high praises of the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung who successfully accomplished the cause of nation-building and built a socialist power centered on the popular masses on this land, laying an eternal foundation for national prosperity. They also highly lauded the undying exploits General Secretary Kim Jong Il has performed by demonstrating the dignity and might of the DPRK with his experienced and seasoned leadership.
					
					 Art performances were also given at theatres in Pyongyang and at those in local areas. 
					
					 Artistes of the State Symphony Orchestra gave a concert at the Moranbong Theatre and those of the State Folk Art Troupe presented a music and dance performance at the Central Youth Hall.
					
					 An acrobatic performance was given at the Pyongyang Circus Theatre.
					
					 Music and dance performances were given at art theatres and cultural halls in various provinces.

articles.title: Dancing Parties Held to Mark Birthday of DPRK
articles.content:
Dancing Parties Held to Mark Birthday of DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties were held by youth and students throughout the country on Wednesday on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the founding of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Plazas of the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Party Founding Memorial Tower and the Arch of Triumph and other venues of dancing parties were alive with youth and students.
					
					 The participants danced to the tune of such songs as "Fly Our
					
					Tricolor National Flag of the Republic" and "O Korea, Sing of This Pride" in boundless reverence for President Kim Il Sung.
					
					Amid the playing of such songs as "Our General Is the Best" and "Let's Sing of Our Dear Popular General" they danced, recollecting the immortal Songun revolutionary exploits performed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il making endless long journeys of patriotic devotion.
					
					 Dances got more exciting when the band played dynamic and cheerful songs one after another. 
					
					 Dancing parties took place in different parts of the country including Sariwon, Hamhung and Chongjin on the same day.
					
					 A dancing party titled "My Great Country" was also held by members of the women's union at the plaza of the Tower of the Juche Idea.

articles.title: Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Beijing
articles.content:
Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Beijing
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- A reception was given at the DPRK embassy in Beijing on Sept. 7 to celebrate the 61st birthday of the DPRK.
					 Present there on invitation were Foreign Minister Yang Jiechi, Deputy Head of the International Liaison Department of the Communist Party of China Liu Jieyi, Chairman of the China-Korea Friendship Association Wu Donghe and officials concerned of the Ministry of Railways, the General Political Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army and the Xinhua News Agency and others. 
					
					 Ambassador Choe Jin Su and officials of the DPRK embassy in Beijing were present there.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					The DPRK ambassador said that the DPRK has developed into a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence, while firmly defending the socialist system under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea over the past 61 years under the wise guidance of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Referring to the events of the "year of the DPRK-China friendship" and exchanges and cooperation brisk in all fields thanks to the deep care of the top leaders of the two countries and concerted efforts of both sides, he said that he would make all efforts to brilliantly decorate the "year of the DPRK-China friendship" and strikingly demonstrate its might.
					
					 The Chinese foreign minister said that over the past 61 years the Korean people have registered great successes in the socialist revolution and construction, single-mindedly united under the leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, adding: The Chinese people are sincerely rejoiced over these achievements and wholeheartedly wish them greater successes in all fields.
					
					 He stressed that China would boost cooperation and exchanges in all fields and continue to develop the bilateral relations in the spirit of "Inheriting tradition, facing up to the future, building good neighborly friendship and strengthening cooperation" on the occasions of the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the two countries and the "year of Sino-DPRK friendship".

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Editorially Observes Birthday of DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Editorially Observes Birthday of DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday editorially calls for eternally glorifying the era of great prosperity of Songun Korea on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the founding of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					The editorial refers to the fact that President Kim Il Sung built a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defense, on this land by working heart and soul all his life and General Secretary Kim Jong Il made the DPRK shine as great Kim Il Sung's Korea, powerful and prosperous, by providing his Songun leadership.
					
					The DPRK has greeted a shining era of the greatest prosperity in the nation's history spanning 5,000 years under the Songun revolutionary leadership, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 Immensely bright and rosy is the future of the DPRK which has dynamically advanced along the road of independence and prosperity holding Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem.
					
					 The editorial calls on all the servicepersons and people to continue giving full play to the traditional revolutionary spirit and fighting traits such as intense loyalty that calls for reposing firm trust in their leader and party only and following them to the last in the on-going great surge, strong national self-esteem which means regarding and glorifying the dignity and honor of the nation as their life and soul and the spirit of self-reliance and the spirit of fortitude which calls for pulling through all difficulties by their own efforts.
					
					 It urges all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad to dynamically advance, courageously shattering the moves of the separatist forces opposed to reunification at home and abroad under the uplifted banner of the historic June 15 joint declaration and the Oct. 4 declaration and thus bring earlier the bright day of national reunification, the cherished desire of the nation. 
					
					 The DPRK will as always firmly adhere to the principle of independence in foreign relations and make every possible effort to boost the solidarity with the peace-loving progressive people of the world opposed to aggression and war.
					
					 The DPRK demonstrating its dignity as a great ideological power and a socialist political and military power will advance vigorously along the road of victory and prosperity in the future, too, concludes the editorial.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Director-General of IIJI Koreans
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Director-General of IIJI
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, on a visit to the DPRK       on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the founding of  the DPRK.
					 The gift was conveyed to an official concerned by Vishwanath on Tuesday.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Il from Overseas
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Il from Overseas Koreans
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a letter from the members of congratulatory groups, delegations and visiting groups of overseas Koreans staying in the homeland on Tuesday on the occasion of the 61st birthday of the DPRK.
					 President Kim Il Sung provided the tradition of building a Juche-oriented government in the crucible of the grim anti-Japanese war and founded the DPRK on the basis of it, the letter said, adding that he resolutely beat back the armed invasion by the U.S. imperialists, successfully defending the sovereignty of the nation, and built a socialist country centered on the popular masses, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence, under the uplifted banner of Juche, thus paving a wide avenue for the development of the country and the prosperity of the nation.
					
					 The letter continued:
					
					 The 60-odd year-long glorious history of the DPRK is shedding more brilliant rays thanks to you and our homeland is demonstrating its might as a dignified socialist power of Juche steering the 21st century and a country of Songun proud of its tremendous national power. 
					
					 You have worked heart and soul day and night for the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people and consolidated the country liberated and glorified by the President as a socialist fortress of Juche standing unfazed in any storm and stress.
					
					 Noting that the DPRK is demonstrating its dignity as an invincible power, standing imposingly in the center of the world, the letter stressed that this is a shining fruition of Kim Jong Il's lofty patriotic idea, noble will and patriotic devotion as he has totally dedicated himself to the country and the nation only.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Il from C.C., AINDF
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Il from C.C., AINDF
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- General Secretay Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory message from the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front on Wednesday, the 61st birthday of the DPRK.
					 The 60-odd-year history of the DPRK is a proud one of victory and glory in which it made a new history of gigantic changes and epoch-making miracles under the leadership of the peerlessly great persons and a sacred course in which it demonstrated the might and invincibility of socialism of Juche to the whole world, weathering out the grim tempest of the anti-imperialist struggle, the message noted.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung's cause of building a rich and powerful country is now in full bloom thanks to you, the great man born of Mt. Paektu, the message said, and went on:
					
					 The north, which has demonstrated its might as a political and ideological power in which the leader and the army and the people have formed a harmonious whole and a nuclear weapons state which no aggressor dares provoke, is inching close to the eminence of an economic power full of confidence. This is the brilliant fruition of the wise leadership provided by you who kindled the torch of a new great revolutionary surge.  
					
					 You are the outstanding leader steering the building of a thriving nation of Juche and the cause of national reunification to victory, shouldering the destiny of the country and the nation upon yourself. The DPRK shedding its rays thanks to Songun is, indeed, the genuine motherland firmly guaranteeing the eternal happiness and prosperity of all the fellow countrymen and a beacon of hope for us people. 
					
					 We the AINDF will thoroughly adhere to and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration under the uplifted banner of "By our nation itself" and work hard to pave a wide avenue for independent reunification, peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Il from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Il from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory message from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Wednesday, the 61st birthday of the DPRK.
					 The message said that President Kim Il Sung liberated the country usurped by the brigandish Japanese imperialists, provided the people with genuine state power and built a socialist power winning victory after victory thanks to independence in politics, self-support in economy and self-reliance in national defense, shattering the imperialists' every ceaseless move for aggression and war. 
					
					 His immortal exploits and benevolence will always remain brilliantly recorded in the history of the country, it noted.
					
					 It stressed that the whole world is highly praising Kim Jong Il as the great leader of the people and an outstanding champion of independence, peace and justice in the present times as he has led the confrontation with the U.S. to victory through his preeminent external activities while building a socialist land of bliss in the country.
					
					The message reiterated the determination of the Chongryon officials and Koreans in Japan to keep pace with the people in the homeland and breathe the same breath with them bringing about changes to victoriously conclude the historic 150-day campaign and thus adorn this year as a year of a decisive turn in laying a solid foundation in the movement of Koreans in Japan as desired by
						 Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Lecture Given in Japan
articles.content:
Lecture Given in Japan
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- A lecture was given at the Korean Hall, Tokyo, on Sept. 7 under the sponsorship of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan on the occasion of the 61st birthday of the DPRK. 
					 Present there were Ho Jong Man, chief vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, its vice-chairmen, the director of the Institute on History of Korean Residents in Japan, department directors of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, leading officials of the organizations and enterprises of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon and officials affiliated to the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon.
					
					 The participants watched video-recorded lecture titled "Our Republic accelerating the building of an economic power with science and technology as an engine."

articles.title: Magazine "Korean Information" Issued in Sweden
articles.content:
Magazine "Korean Information" Issued in Sweden
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The Sweden-Korea Friendship Association issued magazine "Korean Information" No. 3 on the occasion of the 61st birthday of the DPRK.
					 The magazine carried photos on revolutionary activities of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and several articles.
					
					 The magazine in an article titled "61 years covered by the DPRK" noted that President Kim Il Sung led the 20 year-long arduous anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle to victory, liberating the country, and founded the DPRK, the glorious motherland, on September 9, 1948.
					
					 The Korean people have waged a dynamic struggle to open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of the President, true to the plan put forth by Kim Jong Il, added the article. 
					
					 The magazine in an article titled "Nuclear test is a reply to the hostile provocations" stressed that the second nuclear test conducted by the DPRK to bolster up the deterrent for self-defense was a proper reply to the provocative act perpetrated by the U.S. and other hostile forces by bringing its satellite launch for discussion at the U.N.
					
					 The magazine also carried an article introducing the Korean people all out in the drive for building a great prosperous and powerful nation and an article dealing with the barbaric atrocities committed by the U.S. imperialists during the past Korean war.

articles.title: Greetings to Tajik President
articles.content:
Greetings to Tajik President
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, today sent a message of greetings to Emomali Rahmon, President of the Republic of Tajikistan, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message wished the President success in his work and the Tajik people wellbeing and prosperity.

articles.title: DPRK Artistes Perform in Beijing
articles.content:
DPRK Artistes Perform in Beijing 
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Performances were given by the DPRK Cinema Musical Company on a visit to China at the Century Theatre in Beijing on September 4 and 5 on the occasion of the "year of DPRK-China friendship."
					 Among the audiences were prominent figures in the political, public, cultural and art circles, citizens in Beijing and staff members of the DPRK embassy there.
					
					 The performances began with a song "We Single-mindedly Cherish Our Loyalty" from Korean feature film "The Sea of Blood" adapted from the immortal classic masterpiece "The Sea of Blood."
					
					 The company put on the stage such music from Korean films as theme songs of films "The Flower Girl", "When We Pick Apples" and "The Nation and Destiny" and such music from Chinese films as "My Motherland", "The Red Flag" and "Ode to Heroes".
					
					 The performances which closed with a chorus of the immortal revolutionary hymn "Song of General Kim Jong Il" won a high acclaim of the audiences and evoked a lively response among them for their rich ideological contents and high artistry.
					
					 The performance goes on.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Ecuador
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Ecuador
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The Santa Rita Publishing House of Ecuador released in booklet General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might".
					 A book releasing ceremony took place in Quito on August 31.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje de felicitacion de D. Medvedev
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje de felicitacion de D. Medvedev
Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 9 el presidente de la Federacion Rusa, D. Medvedev, con motivo del dia de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					La misiva senala:
					
					Yo expreso mi esperanza de que la cooperacion Rusia-Corea siga desarrollandose conforme a los intereses de los pueblos de los dos paises, de modo que contribuya al afianzamiento de la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y toda la region del Nordeste Asiatico.
					
					Deseo a Usted los exitos y la felicidad y al pueblo coreano la prosperidad.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje de felicitacion de dirigentes chinos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje de felicitacion de dirigentes chinos
Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC, Kim Yong Nam y el premier del Consejo de Ministros, Kim Yong Il recibieron el mensaje de felicitacion que les dirigieran el dia 8 el Presidente de la Republica Popular China, Hu Jintao, el presidente del Comite Permanente de la Asamblea Popular Nacional, Wu Bangguo y el primer ministro del Consejo de Estado, Wen Jiabao con motivo del 61o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea (9 de septiembre).
					La fundacion de la RPDC abrio la nueva pagina de la historia de Corea, comienza el mensaje y prosigue:
					
					A lo largo de estos 61 anos pasados, bajo la direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Secretario General Kim Jong Il y el Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el pueblo coreano logro uno tras otro los exitos gratos en la causa de la revolucion y la construccion socialistas uniendose compactamente y luchando tenazmente.
					
					Estamos sinceramente contentos de eso y deseamos de todo corazon al pueblo coreano mayores exitos en lo adelante en todos los sectores.
					
					El partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de China aprecian mucho invariablemente la tradicional amistad China-Corea.
					
					Deseamos dar el mejor bienestar a los pueblos de ambos paises y defender la paz y la estabilidad de la region al seguir intensificando con la parte coreana, segun el ideal de "continuacion de tradicion, aspiracion al futuro, buena vecindad y fortalecimiento de cooperacion", el intercambio y la cooperacion entre ambos paises en todos los dominios con motivo del 60o aniversario del establecimiento de las relaciones diplomaticas China -Corea y al fomentar el desarrollo considerable de las relaciones de buena vecindad, amistad y cooperacion entre China y Corea.
					
					Formulamos votos por la prosperidad de la RPDC y la felicidad de su pueblo.

articles.title: Rinden homenaje a los martires por aniversario 61 de la RPDC
articles.content:
Rinden homenaje a los martires por aniversario 61 de la RPDC 
Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ATCC) -- En ocasion del 61o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, tuvieron lugar este miercoles las ceremonias de homenaje en el Cementerio de Martires Revolucionarios en el Monte Taesong y el Cementerio de Patriotas.
					Estaban colocadas en ambos lugares las ofrendas florales enviadas por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					En las ocasiones estuvieron presentes los cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, las organizaciones de masas, los ministerios y los organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					Fueron depositadas alli tambien las ofrendas florales en nombre del CC del PTC, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la RPDC, el Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, organizaciones de masas, ministerios, organos centrales, unidades del EPC, los organos de educacion, salud publica, prensa e informacion, los organismos del partido y el Poder, las empresas y las granjas en esta capital.
					
					Los participantes rindieron sublime homenaje a los martires.
					
					Este dia, al pie de las estatuas de bronce de los martires, los monumentos a los martires del EPC y las tumbas de ellos en distintas partes del pais fueron colocados tambien las ofrendas florales, ramos y ramitas de flores.

articles.title: Actua en Beijing Conjunto Musical para el Cine de Corea
articles.content:
Actua en Beijing Conjunto Musical para el Cine de Corea
Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Conjunto Musical para el Cine de Corea, de visita en China con motivo del "Ano de amistad Corea-China", actuo los dias 4 y 5 en el Teatro Siglo en Beijing.
					  Disfrutaron la funcion las personalidades celebres del circulo politico, social, cultural y artistico de China, los pekineses y los miembros de la embajada coreana en China.
					
					  La funcion comenzo con la cancion "Considera el alma roja de todo corazon" que se escucha en la pelicula de ficcion "Mar de sangre" adaptada de la obra clasica de igual nombre.
					
					   Esa banda coreana presento las musicas de cine coreano como las canciones principales de las peliculas "Florista", "La cosecha de manzanas" y "La nacion y el destino" y las chinas como "Mi patria", "Bandera roja", "Himno al heroe", etc.
					
					La funcion, que bajo el telon con el coro del inmortal himno revolucionario "Cancion del General
						 Kim Jong Il", arranco efusiva ovacion de los espectadores por su alto nivel ideo-artistico produciendo grandes repercusiones.
					
					  La funcion continua.
